name: Transport Contract Library Authority
purpose: Deterministic governance-only confinement envelope library. No truth edits, no iteration.

classifier.rule: H-mode if P_SOL_MW >= f_LH * P_LH_MW else L-mode
classifier.notes: Uses existing Martin-2008 proxy in phase1_models.

caps.H_required_max_optimistic: optional cap; if finite, constraint H_required_opt must pass
caps.H_required_max_robust: optional cap; if finite, constraint H_required_rob must pass

assumptions: All τE scalings are used as envelope members only; evaluator truth remains unchanged.
Regime classifier is a deterministic proxy; no hysteresis modeling.
author: © 2026 Afshin Arjhangmehr
